text: ERROR. You may have set an incorrect text id.
This minimal text dialog node uses default values, and will end shortly.

superfluous_example.name: Name

choices.self_comment: janky way to say: different next id by choice depending on condition

choices.text: You haven't talked to me before.
I see you've talked to me before.

next: default_id, must always be last and a string

text: Welcome, [rainbow freq=0.2 sat=10 val=20][wave amp=50 freq=2]&[/wave][/rainbow].

opening_scene.name: King
text: [shake rate=10 level=10]Brave Knight,| I have called you here today| in our darkest| hour!||[/shake]

os_2.name: King
text: [shake rate=10 level=10]For countless generations| the crown has been a symbol of strength,| fortitude,| and happiness.||[/shake]

os_3.name: King
text: [shake rate=10 level=10]But alas,| I have lost it in our castle's deepest,| darkest,| dungeon.|| Who knows what foul beasts await ye|...poisonous rats,| traps,| winged beasts,| ghoulies|..........Where was I? [/shake]

os_4.name: King
text: [shake rate=10 level=10]Oh yes.|| I require your aid -|| gather your courage for the journey,| vanquish the evil that lurks below,| rise to your place among the Hall of the Greats,| and return the CROWN||........What say you?||[/shake]

choices.text: Yes, my liege. I will retrieve the crown!
Can you repeat that? I wasn't paying attention...

boring_spiel_accept.name: King
text: [shake rate=10 level=10]You are very brave indeed,| now heed these words of wisdom:|| I am reminded of the time when,| as a young boy,| I got stuck in a thicket with a sweetroll my mother gave me..||It was quite prickly||...the thicket,| not the sweetroll||...and it ripped a hole right in my...[/shake]

boring_spiel_decline.name: King
text: [shake rate=10 level=10]Very Well,| listen closely.|| I am reminded of the time when,| as a young boy,| I got stuck in a thicket with a sweetroll my mother gave me..||It was quite prickly||...the thicket,| not the sweetroll||...and it ripped a hole right in my...[/shake]

bs_2.name: King
text: [shake rate=10 level=10]...|The next thing you know...|||......bananas and milk...|...........scraping mud off my boots......|..........|it was the funniest thing ye know?.............|And that's how I obtained 5 loaves of bread from the market that day...|[/shake]

choices.text: You are very wise, Your Majesty
